personal_statement: Driven and enthusiastic computer science graduate seeking an internship in tech to apply and expand my skills in real-world settings. With a strong academic record, sharp analytical thinking, and hands-on experience in AI-powered applications and software development, I bring both creativity and technical depth. I'm eager to contribute to impactful projects, learn from professional individuals, and thrive in a innovative environment.
experience: IT Intern at General Administration of Information Technology at the university of Tabuk (June 2024 - Aug 2024). Gained practical knowledge in IT infrastructure and security policies. Created Use Case diagrams, Flowcharts, and technical documentation as well as database management for software projects. Developed 'Technical Support System', a full-stack web application using Angular and Django. Completed Introductory Artificial Intelligence Training Program at KAUST Academy (Jan 2025), selected through entry exam for 40-hour intensive training on machine learning fundamentals.
relevant_skills: Programming Languages: Java, Python, SQL, C#, LaTeX. Libraries & Tools: Flask, React Native, HTML, CSS, node.js, Git, NumPy, Pandas, Pytesseract, Docker, Unity game engine. Strong understanding of software development principles and RAG pipeline. Experience with AI/ML model development, full-stack web applications, and mobile app development.
